db:abstract.db:para: The Fetch More example shows how two add items to an item view model on demand.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
HEADERS = filelistmodel.h \ window.h SOURCES = filelistmodel.cpp \ main.cpp \ window.cpp
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/itemviews/fetchmore INSTALLS += target
